author: Reuters Editorial
title: Lebanon's Blom Bank Q1 net profit up 4.28 pct
text:
BEIRUT, April 30 (Reuters) - Lebanonâ€™s Blom Bank said on Monday that its first-quarter net profit was $116.83 million, up 4.28 percent from the same period of 2017, and that its assets had risen by 10.13 percent since the end of March 2017.
Deposits rose 5.87 percent to $26.73 billion, loans by 6.53 percent to $7.58 billion and shareholders equity by 9.41 percent to $3.13 billion, it said in an emailed statement. (Reporting by Angus McDowall and Dahlia Nehme, editing by Louise Heavens)
